text: I am using Bridgestone. That one also MIThai

I also using Bridgestone potenza RE-71rs

the thinner the tyre  the lesser grip on the road. the wider the tyres  more grip on the road. but at the expense of fc

More accurate than built in system that estimate pressure based on rotation speed
Cannot compare via size.Big size doesn't means more grip.For family/personalcar useTreadwear 300-400Traction ATemp A🌧️ A<72DBTaxis useTread wear >400 to 600

How ? Rain everything ok ?

I think  considering they’re semi slicks they’re pretty impressive in the rain. Heavy downpour you might feel it slip a bit more  but if you have good control of your car and know how to get it back  it’s not bad.Light rain is fine.
I’m not one to hurl into a corner at 120 on public roads anyways 🤣
So if anyone reads this and is sideways going round a bend at 120 in the rain  that’s on you.
Also  it’s considerably noisier than the PS4S  but not that much more uncomfortable.
Honestly would keep these on if I didn’t have a fresh set of PS4S waiting
My car is rear weight biased.
Ah..Beetle engine is at the rear
modern ones all front engine le  make use of the MQB platform
